information.name: mkt-queue-sync
information.description: Plugin para sincronizar simple queues con los limites de velocidad establecidos en Ucrm - Very basic plugin based on a Ubiquiti plugin, to synchronize Ucrm Services with Miktotik Simple Queue https://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/Manual:Queue
information.author: Franco Johan Gampel - franco@gampel.com.ar

configuration.label: Burst Threshold Percentage
configuration.description: Burst Threshold Percentage/Porcentaje de Umbral de rafaga | Percentage of Max-Limit/Porcentaje del Max-Limit | (If not used configure 0/Si no se utiliza configurar en 0)

configuration.label: Burst Time
configuration.description: Burst Time/Tiempo de Rafaga (If not used configure 0/Si no se utiliza configurar en 0)

configuration.label: Add Queue?
configuration.description: Add queue simple in case it does not exist? (0 = NO / 1 = YES)
